frontmatter.title: Skeleton tabs
frontmatter.shortDescription: Provides a low fidelity representation of content before it appears, improving perceived load times.

examples.title: Default
With a custom count

pageProps.seoDescription: Skeleton tabs are used to provide a low fidelity representation of content before it appears on the page, and improves load times perceived by merchants. Can be used for content in or outside of a card.
